NotLoggedIn.title: You’re not logged in
NotLoggedIn.description: Please log in to access your account and see personalized content.

NotAllowed.title: Access Denied
NotAllowed.description: You do not have permission to view this page. Please contact support.

landingpage.panelDesc: Our control panel makes managing your server a breeze: start, stop, or restart your server with a single click. Monitor performance and upgrade resources easily—stress-free and super intuitive.
landingpage.fileManagerDesc: Download files easily in your browser or upload new ones manually. For advanced file operations like editing, moving, or bulk uploads, please use an FTP client.
landingpage.backupDesc: Your game data is safe with us! With automatic backups, you're always on the safe side. Restore with a single click and you're back in the game instantly.
landingpage.ctaHeader: Ready to host your game server?

notAdminDescription: You do not have admin rights to view this page.

getHelp.title1: We don't have a FAQ yet, but you can
getHelp.answerToEmail: We will still reply to the email from your account, it's easier :)
getHelp.weWillAnswer: and we will answer as quickly as possible
getHelp.ticketCreationFailed: Support ticket could not be created

PROVISIONING.title: Server is being created
PROVISIONING.message: Your server is currently being provisioned.

CREATION_FAILED.title: Server creation failed
CREATION_FAILED.message: We couldn't create your server. Please contact support or try again.

ACTIVE.title: Server is ready
ACTIVE.message: Your server is up and running. You can connect now.

DOES_NOT_EXIST.title: Server not found
DOES_NOT_EXIST.message: We couldn't find this server. If this persists, contact support.

PAYMENT_FAILED.title: Payment failed
PAYMENT_FAILED.message: Your payment did not go through. Please try again.

PAYMENT_PROCESSING.title: Processing payment
PAYMENT_PROCESSING.message: We're processing your payment. This should only take a moment.

EXPIRED.title: Server expired
EXPIRED.message: This server has expired. Please renew to continue.

DELETED.title: Server deleted
DELETED.message: This server was deleted and is no longer available.

info.title: Upgrade Information
info.description: Here you can only extend or upgrade your server. For downgrades, please see here.

auth.loginRequiredGameConfig: You need to be logged in to configure game-specific settings

payment.title: Complete Your Payment
payment.footerHint: Complete payment above to create your server

gameConfig.title: {game} Configuration
gameConfig.noSpecific: No specific configuration options available for this game.

RegisterLogin.title: Welcome
RegisterLogin.subtitle: Register with your Discord or Google account

login.title: Welcome back
login.subtitle: Login with your Discord or Google account

validation.passwordMin: Password must be at least {min} characters

RegisterLogin.disclaimer: By clicking continue, you agree to our <terms>Terms of Service</terms> and <privacy>Privacy Policy</privacy>.

payments.oauthPasswordChangeNotice: Since you signed in via OAuth, you can't change your password here.
payments.oauthPasswordChangeTooltip: Password changes are only possible when you sign in with email.
